summary: After his photojournalist brother gets killed by a white tigress in the jungles of the Sundarbans, Pandit and his team of commandos enter the prohibited core area of the forest to avenge his death.
cast: Aadil Chahal|Ahran Chaudhary|Pranay Dixit|Subrat Dutta|Nora Fatehi|Virendra Singh Ghuman|Achint Kaur|Ali Quli Mirza|Abhinav Shukla|Himarsha Venkatsamy
title: Roar
